description: On sale! Magnificent independent House / Chalet with impressive views of the Navacerrada reservoir and orientation towards the Bola del Mundo. Located a few steps from the center of Navacerrada, this property stands out for its excellent communication with Madrid. Located in an urbanization with 24-hour security, it has optimal differential elements, such as a security system with motion detector cameras, piped music and fiber optic Wi-Fi. Inside, we find Canadian oak flooring and high-quality carpentry. It has six bedrooms, four bathrooms and a toilet, as well as three living rooms to enjoy large open spaces. The house has a hot/cold pump heating system and an insulated and armored security upstairs. In addition, it has a cozy fireplace and three parking spaces. The property stands out for its 15 cm rock wool insulation and has automatic irrigation in its large front patio. It also has a central aspiration system and a garden area. The house is filled with light thanks to its large double glazed windows. The kitchen, with an island, has a practical garbage disposal. With a constructed area of 400 m² and useful areas of 390 m², this independent House / Chalet offers all the necessary comforts. In addition, it has built-in wardrobes, storage room, terrace, balcony and south orientation. All this on a 1,500 m² plot. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this incredible property. Call us now and arrange a visit!

description: ^^EXCEPTIONAL INDEPENDENT VILLA, COMPLETELY RENOVATED, WITH INCREDIBLE PANORAMIC TERRACE^^ Discover this magnificent opportunity to live in a completely renovated independent villa of 232 m2, in one of the most stunning natural environments in Madrid. This charming villa is situated on a 500 m2 plot, offering multiple spaces and ideal settings to create unforgettable moments with your family and friends. The house has been entirely refurbished and features a fabulous kitchen that opens up to a spectacular outdoor dining terrace, perfect for enjoying the warm Madrid summers. The spacious main living room, bathed in natural light, consists of two distinct areas and connects to a large 41 m2 terrace that provides unparalleled panoramic views. The three bedrooms in this house offer flexibility to adapt to your needs, allowing you to enjoy exceptional privacy and create different spaces according to your preferences. The villa boasts a spacious garage with direct access to the house, with room for two vehicles. As for the plot, you won't be able to resist the tranquility and the wonderful south-facing terrace, perfect for savoring summer days. Additionally, the garden requires minimal maintenance, making care effortless. Located in the municipality of Collado Mediano, this villa is close to points of interest and all necessary amenities, making it the ideal place to relish the stunning natural surroundings. If you are seeking to live in a unique villa in Madrid, in one of the most beautiful municipalities in the capital, this is your future home! ^^This advertisement is not binding and may contain errors. It is provided for informational purposes and is not contractual^^ ***WE DO NOT CHARGE COMMISSION TO THE BUYER.

CAPITAL HOME ALPEDRETE SELLS GREAT SEMI-DETACHED VILLA, IN THE UPPER AREA OF COLLADO MEDIANO, WITH EXCELLENT VIEWS, LOTS OF SPACE AND INFINITE POSSIBILITIES. We are facing a semi-detached house located near the area next to the pine forest, in the upper part of Collado Mediano. This 351m2 house distributed over two floors has been built on a 569m2 plot, built in 1987 with various updates throughout its useful life. It is distributed as follows: Firstly, we find the hall, arranged after a recently repaired and paved entrance, recently perfectly waterproofed, which leads to the kitchen room, with direct entrance to the garage, the latter could be given to the kitchen to generate a spacious room, since it is parked perfectly on the road and we have another semi-covered outdoor space for a vehicle. Returning to the hall we have access to the living-dining room, arranged on two levels, with direct access to a terrace space with excellent views to the south where we can contemplate the garden area and the mountain range that surrounds the house. As for the rest area located on this floor, we find a full bathroom and the master bedroom, with a built-in wardrobe and private access. On the upper floor, there are three bedrooms, a full bathroom and a transitional room as a very pleasant living room. This floor enjoys excellent views and north and south orientation. Moving to the lower floor of the house, it is intended as a cellar or apartment, where we have a full bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, two living rooms, one of them with direct access to the garden and an open space where we can have a games area. , workshop, warehouse, etc. next to the boiler room where the diesel burner is located. The LOWER WAREHOUSE PART IS IDEAL TO LOCATE ANY TYPE OF BUSINESS, PROFESSIONAL ACTIVITY, AS AN INDEPENDENT APARTMENT OR STUDY, GAME, OFFICE AREA. The garden area is staggered, terraces have been implemented to take advantage of the land and a space for a gazebo and swimming pool could be generated, complemented by the covered area ideal for holding leisure events. Finally, the home has an excellent proximity to the town center, less than 10 minutes walk from the services offered by the municipality, in addition to transport options such as the A-6 10 minutes by car, supermarkets such as DIA, HIBER, Carrefour de Villalba, Mercadona and the General Hospital of Collado Villalba.

Single family home in Collado Mediano Single family home in Serranía de la Paloma; with spectacular views to the mountains and an independent apartment on the ground floor. This property has three floors, upstairs, a fairly large attic with open space, a bedroom, a bathroom with shower and a terrace with wonderful views. Main floor, there is a living room, a kitchen, 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms, also two terraces and a porch. On this floor we access to a hall and follow to the fully furnished kitchen with a large storage capacity, spacious and very bright, with a small terrace. On the same floor we have a 30 m2 living-dining room with a new fireplace, and large double glazed windows, with a balcony with views to the mountains and the garden. On the basement there is another house with an entrance hall with a built-in wardrobe, a large living room, a complete bathroom, a fully equipped and furnished kitchen, and one bedroom, the apartment has an independent heater from the rest of the house. The apartment rooms have windows and can be accessed independently from the garden. Attached to this apartment is the 56m2 garage with capacity for 3-4 cars. Oil heating with new Ferroli boiler. Located in Collado Mediano town, in the wonderful Serranía de la Paloma Urbanization, just five minutes from the train station and just 40 minutes from Madrid on the A6 highway or the M-607 highway. Magnificent views and surrounded by native pine forests are very close to Navacerrada reservoir where you can have a walk by spectacular surroundings. It has access to all the services like pharmacy, bakery, supermarket, optician, restaurants, Post Office, Health Center, Sports Center, municipal swimming pools, paddle and tennis courts. Just 10 minutes to Villalba Hospital with impeccable management, one of the best in the entire Community of Madrid.

A GARAGE SPACE IS AVAILABLE FOR RENT 2 MINUTES FROM THE HOUSE. It is distributed as follows: Firstly we locate the tube-shaped hall, which leads to the living-dining room, this one with a completely symmetrical shape, with two large windows facing south, in the same room there is a door leading to the first bedroom, with the same orientation as the previous room and with the possibility of generating a single room as a living room since we do not have load-bearing walls. Next, after returning to the hallway, we locate the kitchen, with a built-in wardrobe, a window to the interior patio of the property that requires updating. We continue down the hallway and find the second bedroom, with two windows facing south-east, the built-in wardrobe updated with pine wood, sliding doors and perfectly dressed. NO FEES TO THE BUYER BEAUTIFUL SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE WITH 4 BEDROOMS, 3 BATHROOMS AND POOL What you are looking for, a spacious and bright house in the Sierra, with space for everyone, mountain views and well connected.And also a garden, a manageable garden, with everything you need to enjoy the outdoors with family and friends; a porch, a pool… THIS HOUSE IS SPECIAL BECAUSE of its orientation (which makes it very bright), its distribution (practical and functional, with a bedroom and full bathroom on the main floor, which allows living on a single floor) and its spaciousness (with space for everyone and for everything). It is located in one of the best urbanizations in Collado Mediano, in a very quiet residential area with a bus to Madrid 4 minutes walk away, a suburban station 6 minutes away by car and by road 35 minutes from Madrid. The 280m2 garden is very well designed and ready to enjoy the outdoors.With a porch/terrace where you can go out for breakfast or dinner, a piece of grass and a small pool to cool off when the heat hits. IT IS IMPORTANT TO KNOW that this 180m2 built house is located on a 280m2 plot, in one of the quietest areas of the Sierra, 35 minutes from Madrid and a stone's throw from everything that the Sierra can offer you and your family. Built in 2005, it is perfectly preserved and designed by its owners to be enjoyed. Heating and hot water are provided by a natural gas boiler.The house has smooth paint, the exterior carpentry is excellent beige lacquered aluminum enclosures with double glazing, folding and tilt-and-turn, and the interior carpentry is lacquered in beige, matching the enclosures. DISTRIBUTION We are welcomed by a small front garden, completely paved, we enter the hall of the house where there is the exit to the garage of the house, the kitchen with access to the terrace and the garden, the living room with fireplace and access to the terrace and the garden., a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, a full bathroom and the stairs that go up to the rest of the bedrooms. On the upper floor, a comfortable square hallway gives access to three other large bedrooms (which have lots of light and large built-in wardrobes) and a second full bathroom.The master bedroom with more than 20m2 has another en-suite bathroom and terrace with views. COMMUNICATIONS: By car; 35 minutes from Plaza Castilla on the M-607 and 35 minutes from Moncloa on the A-6 By public transport; 4 minutes walk from the bus stop to Moncloa and 6 minutes by car from the Collado Mediano Cercanías Station. SHOPPING AREA Mercadona, ALDI and Lidl supermarkets 11 minutes away by car Los Valles Shopping Center (with Carrefour) 10' away Planetocio Shopping Center (with Cinemas, Restaurants and Media Markt) 12' away LEISURE From home you can walk every day through a unique natural environment, such as the Sierra de Guadarrama. And by car a few minutes away, La Barranca, Navacerrada, the Peñalara Lagoons, the Smith path, the surroundings of the Jarosa Reservoir, etc. SCHOOLS In a few minutes around, a wide range of public, private and subsidized schools and university, public and private campuses HOSPITALS Collado Villalba General Hospital 9' away HM Torrelodones Hospital 20' away.

**^SPECTACULAR ALPINE TYPE CHALET WITH UNBEATABLE VIEWS IN THE PRESTIGIOUS URBANIZATION REAJO DEL ROBLE^**^ The house combines modern design inside, with a façade respecting the external environment and the landscape of the area. The upper floor is the jewel in the crown, the plant is distributed in such a way that from its windows we have spectacular views of the Navacerrada Reservoir. The house has underfloor heating, smooth walls, has security windows and thermal insulation, electric shutters, thermostat by rooms, all kinds of details… We know that this house is special, because both the house and its surroundings are for someone who knows how to value the quality of nature and who is a lover of peace. CAPITAL HOME ALPEDRETE sells a magnificent independent villa located in one of the Improved areas of Collado Mediano.The house has about 250 m2 built, divided into three floors, on a 500 m2 plot. It is distributed as follows: On the ground floor we find a large garage with an automatic door and space for two vehicles, a covered and heated pool, a toilet, a storage room and a living room with a fireplace ideal for gatherings with friends and family throughout the year. On the first floor we find a pleasant covered porch from where you access the house.Once inside, the first thing we find is a spacious and bright living room due to its large windows, with two well-differentiated areas, a rest area that revolves around the fireplace and another dining area.In addition, a bedroom with built-in wardrobes, a complete bathroom with a bathtub and a kitchen with an office area and direct access to a sunny outdoor area and barbecue area. On the second floor we find two bedrooms (one of them with built-in wardrobes), a bathroom with a shower and the master suite with a dressing area, hot-cold air pump, full bathroom with bathtub and terrace. It is worth highlighting the house: The house was completely renovated (plumbing, electricity, heating, floors, exterior carpentry, roof, etc.) less than ten years ago. It has individual LPG gas heating with aluminum radiators, exterior carpentry in tilt-and-turn PVC vinyl wood, floors mostly made of parquet, walls in smooth paint, PVC plumbing, automatic blinds in the living room, chimney ducting in the Upper floor, automatic irrigation, well, automatic exterior access and garage door.Everything in perfect condition with high quality materials used. As for the outdoor area, perfectly maintained, divided into two heights and two clearly differentiated areas.A green area with natural grass and established trees such as fig and olive trees.And another paved area that includes the entrance porch and large areas where the barbecue, the well and the boiler room are located. Another aspect to highlight is the location of the home, located on one of the main streets of the municipality, but which enjoys great tranquility and an ideal environment.Very close to the center of town (less than ten minutes on foot), public schools such as Virgen de la Paz, supermarkets, De la Fuente Park, and all kinds of services. It also has a bus stop just 100 meters away with lines 683 to Madrid-Moncloa, and line 690 that runs through the surrounding towns and the Cercanías Renfe station 250 meters away with line C8.

Do you want to buy a building with unfinished work for sale in Collado Mediano? Excellent opportunity to own this building under construction, located in the town of Collado Mediano, province of Madrid. Collado Mediano is a municipality located in the Sierra de Madrid, located in the surroundings of the Sierra de Guadarrama Natural Park. It has very good connections, both by road and public transport. As for public transport, it has bus lines, both urban and interurban, that connect the municipality with neighboring towns and with the city of Madrid, which is located at a distance of approximately 45 kilometers. So if you are fed up with unhealthy, small apartments, without outdoor spaces and built with poor quality materials... If you consider yourself a conscious person and you know that the smart thing to do is to take care of your health and that of your loved ones, this is your opportunity to have a passive house. Or what is the same, a sustainable house. A house that consumes the minimum amount of energy, optimizing the energy it uses as much as possible.It will keep you cool in summer and warm in winter, without your bill noticing.That means savings for you, because electricity consumption can be reduced to almost 0. And this is possible because it will have a hot-cold underfloor heating system installed using aerothermal energy, and a ventilation and air filtration system that guarantee comfort and safety. It will be built with a revolutionary system using CLT (Cross Laminated Timber) wooden structures, an ecological material that also improves insulation, stability and health benefits. Your new home is not the future but the present of construction, and it will not lose value, but will increase in value. And of course, it's going to be so, so pretty, that you're going to enjoy living in it...and showing it.
